item.title: Startup: Change is the only constant
item.description:
ð—¦ð˜ð—®ð—¿ð˜ð˜‚ð—½: ð—–ð—µð—®ð—»ð—´ð—² ð—¶ð˜€ ð˜ð—µð—² ð—¼ð—»ð—¹ð˜† ð—°ð—¼ð—»ð˜€ð˜ð—®ð—»ð˜

It’s human nature to get scared when there is change in the way we work. Be it the first day of school, first day in a new job, even when you get married, thereâ€™s always fear about how things will turn out in this new environment.

So this fear comes when you are willing to do something which you wanted to do. Now let’s think what if we are forced to change. Now there will be more frustration than fear as change is imposed on us and we are not in control.
